name: strndxid
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cnx)), cfv(c1, c0)))

stmt.origin: eqcomd(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cnx)), cfv(c1, c0), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cnx)), cfv(c1, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cnx))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cnx)), cfv(c1, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cnx))))

stmt.origin: strfvnd(c1, c0, cfv(c1, cnx), c2, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cnx))))
-| wceq(c1, cslot(cfv(c1, cnx)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cnx)), cfv(c1, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cslot(cfv(c1, cnx)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, cslot(cfv(c1, cnx)))
-| wceq(c1, cslot(c3))
-| wcel(c3, cn)
body.pretty:
⊢ c1 = Slot((c1 ` ndx))
⊣ c1 = Slot(c3)
⊣ c3 ∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cnx)), cfv(c1, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cslot(c3))
-| wcel(c3, cn)

comment: The value of a structure component extractor is the value of the corresponding slot of the structure. (Contributed by AV, 13-Mar-2020.)
